summary: Full-stack / Back-End Java developer with 4 years of experience (80% Java back-end, 20% JavaScript front-end). Proficient in Java, Spring Boot (Security, Data, JPA, Config), microservices, Docker, Kafka, REST, and databases (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Redis, HSQLDB). Experienced in building multi-service applications, logging/monitoring, notification workflows, and testing (JUnit5, Mockito). Front-end basics in HTML5/CSS3/React. Languages: English, Hebrew, Russian.

experience.title: JAVA BACK-END developer
experience.description: Developed multiple microservices for several projects: (1) a system to prevent brute-force login attempts by blocking bad IPs across 14 microservices with log ingestion, analysis, DB storage, and email notifications; (2) a municipal solution for analyzing illegal parking using messages from cameras and Google Maps API geocoding across 15 microservices; (3) a logs and bugs analytics/reporting platform across 17 microservices with REST API, DB storage, email alerts, and search/filter functionality. Implemented with Spring Boot, Lombok, Spring Config Server, and related Spring technologies.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: Developed business websites for cosmetics brand and Hi-Tech news; built corporate portal for dental-clinic equipment supplier. Front-end: WordPress, custom CMS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React. Back-end: Spring Boot, REST API, JUnit5/Mockito; created REST APIs, unit tests, bug fixes, and API documentation with Postman/Swagger; used Javax validation and GitHub for version control.

experience.title: Data Scientist
experience.description: Data analysis and development of computer reference legal systems; placement of legal documents in internal databases; formation of tables of contents and hyperlinks; HTML.

education.degree: Master’s degree in Computer reference legal systems
Adaptation program for software developers according to Israel IT technologies
